sentences.en: Hardness testing the depth and the trapezium of the carbonized layers and quench hardened layers.
sentences.cn: 炭化层和淬火硬化层的深度及梯度的硬度测试.

sentences.en: The section of the embankment model was symmetric trapezium and the clay was its filling.
sentences.cn: 路堤模型采用梯形对称截面,并以粘土作为填料制作.

sentences.en: The truly refreshing and unique contour and trapezium design adds a modern touch to your bathroom.
sentences.cn: 真正令人耳目一新的独特轮廓和梯形设计给您的浴室增添了现代的格调.

sentences.en: This time the modules are rectangular but they also can be in a shape of a trapezium and letter L.
sentences.cn: 这个模块是矩形的但是它们也可以是不规则四边形或像字母L一样。

words.tran_cn: （英）梯形（等于trapezoid）；（美）[数]不规则四边形；大多角骨

trans.tran_en: a shape with four sides, only two of which are parallel
